altername_name: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae: Hashutsujo - Nakagawa Land Dai-Race! no Maki
name: Kochira Katsushikaku Kamearikouenmae Hashutsujo Nakagawa Land Dai Race! no Maki
overview: Kochira Katsushikaku Kamearikouenmae Hashutsujo Nakagawa Land Dai Race! no Maki (こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所 中川ランド大レース！の巻) is a 1997 virtual board game by Bandai for the Sega Saturn based on the Kochira Katsushikaku Kamearikouenmae Hashutsujo anime.
